brief_desc.en-US: Print network connections, routing tables, interface statistics, masquerade connections, and multicast memberships
brief_desc.zh-CN: 打印网络连接、路由表、接口统计信息、伪装连接和组播成员

description.en-US: Displays information about the Linux networking subsystem. The type of information printed is controlled by the options provided.
description.zh-CN: 显示有关 Linux 网络子系统的信息。打印的信息类型由提供的选项控制。

description.en-US: Display multicast group membership information for IPv4 and IPv6.
description.zh-CN: 显示 IPv4 和 IPv6 的组播组成员信息。

description.en-US: Display a table of all network interfaces, or the specified interface.
description.zh-CN: 显示所有网络接口的表格，或指定的接口。

description.en-US: Display a list of masqueraded connections.
Display summary statistics for each protocol.
description.zh-CN: 显示每个协议的汇总统计信息。

description.en-US: Tell the user what is going on by being verbose. Print additional useful information about unconfigured address families.
description.zh-CN: 通过详细输出告诉用户正在发生什么。打印有关未配置的地址族的附加有用信息。

description.en-US: Show numerical addresses instead of resolving symbolic host, port, or user names.
description.zh-CN: 显示数字地址而不是解析符号主机、端口或用户名。

description.en-US: Print selected information every second continuously.
description.zh-CN: 每秒连续打印所选信息。

description.en-US: Display additional information. Use this option twice for maximum detail.
description.zh-CN: 显示附加信息。使用此选项两次以获得最大详细信息。

description.en-US: Include information related to networking timers.
description.zh-CN: 包括与网络定时器相关的信息。

description.en-US: Show the PID and name of the program to which each socket belongs.
description.zh-CN: 显示每个套接字所属程序的 PID 和名称。

description.en-US: Show only listening sockets. These are omitted by default.
description.zh-CN: 仅显示监听套接字。默认情况下，这些会被省略。

description.en-US: Show both listening and non-listening (established connections) sockets.
description.zh-CN: 显示监听和非监听（已建立的连接）套接字。

description.en-US: Specifies the address families (e.g., inet, unix) for which connections are shown.
description.zh-CN: 指定显示连接的地址族（例如，inet、unix）。

description.en-US: If SELinux is enabled, print SELinux context.
description.zh-CN: 如果启用了 SELinux，打印 SELinux 上下文。

description.en-US: Specify the delay between each display update when using the --continuous option.
description.zh-CN: 在使用 --continuous 选项时，指定每次显示更新之间的延迟。
